com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Interface OptionIterableBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder, EnumOptionIterableBuilder, FixedOptionIterableBuilder

    public interface OptionIterableBuilder
    Interface for delegating building of OptionFormElementBuilder items until a ViewElementBuilderContext is available. Responsible for creating an Iterable.

    Implementations should set the OptionFormElementBuilder.rawValue(Object) if they want auto-selection of options to work.

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    OptionGenerator, FixedOptionIterableBuilder, EnumOptionIterableBuilder, EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<OptionFormElementBuilder> buildOptions(com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilderContext builderContext)
      Generates a list of option items.
      default boolean isSorted()
      Return sorting information, this will determine if the OptionGenerator will sort them by name (if default sorting configuration applies).

    • Method Detail

      • buildOptions

        Iterable<OptionFormElementBuilder> buildOptions(com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilderContext builderContext)
        Generates a list of option items.
        Parameters:
        builderContext - context information
        Returns:
        iterable with the options

      • isSorted

        default boolean isSorted()
        Return sorting information, this will determine if the OptionGenerator will sort them by name (if default sorting configuration applies).
        Returns:
        true if the options built should be considered as "sorted"
